category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Where_Ref_Avoid_Duplicate_Expansion
preference.preference_description: Simplifies the tree view resulting from the Where referencedSearch command. The subtree of duplicate notes is not displayed. Valid Values: true - Simplifies the tree view by not displaying the subtree of duplicate notes. false - Displays the subtree of duplicate notes.
